title: 230: Chatting Slow Fashion + Bekah’s Collection!
itunes:title: 230: Chatting Slow Fashion + Bekah’s Collection!
description:
Today The Broads are chatting about Bekah’s new clothing line “The Good Alma” and are then joined Abigail Chapin to discuss fast fashion, natural fiber and fabrics, how the production of clothing can effect the environment, synthetic fibers, practical ways to shop clothing, and much more!


THE GOOD ALMA:*Launches Monday March 1st at 10am PST - enter your email at thegoodalma.com to be the first to know when the collection drops! Follow Instagram: @thegoodalma


ABIGAIL CHAPIN:Follow her store instagram: @abigailroseandlilytooShop Website: www.abigailrosestore.com

Follow music instagram: @chapinsisters

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***SKOUT’S HONOR: To receive 20% off your first order, go to SKOUTSHONOR.COM/CHATTY

***FUNCTION OF BEAUTY: Go to FUNCTIONOFBEAUTY.COM/BROADS to save 20% on your first order!

***MEJURI: Visit MEJURI.COM/CHATTY for 10% off your order!

***PLUSH CARE: Go to PLUSHCARE.COM / CHATTY to start your free 30-day trial!

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
